title: Avid search for missing Texas rodeo goat bringing residents of county together
description: They're using horses, ATVs and even considering a helicopter to find the animal.

title: Separate boat crashes in Cape Cod and the Ozarks leave 1 dead, 13 injured: Police
description: Separate boat crashes in Massachusetts and Missouri over the weekend have left multiple people injured and at least one person dead.

title: Bodies of 4 killed in Alaska helicopter crash are recovered from lake
description: Authorities in Alaska say search and rescue divers have recovered the bodies of a helicopter pilot and three state scientists whose aircraft went down in a shallow lake last week

title: 3 injured when small plane crashes in residential neighborhood in Massachusetts
description: Three people were injured when a small plane crashed into a residential neighborhood in Massachusetts

title: 3 dead and 3 injured in San Antonio house fire
description: The San Antonio fire chief says three people were killed and three others have been injured in a house fire

title: Weekend shootings leave at least 6 dead, 20 others wounded in Chicago
description: Six people have died and at least 20 others were wounded in weekend shootings across Chicago

title: 'I worry' about 'price' to get soldier Travis King back from North Korea, McCaul says
description: North Korea could impose demands in order for the U.S. to retrieve Travis King, Michael McCaul said Sunday

title: WATCH:  Shark hunts school of fish off Long Island
description: Drone footage captured a shark working its way through a school of fish in the water off Southampton, New York. This comes as officials increase shark patrol at beaches amid an uptick in sightings.

title: Musk says Twitter to change logo to "X" from the bird
description: Changes could come as early as Monday.

title: WATCH:  Soccer match abandoned after hearse drives onto pitch in England
description: A local soccer match in Gateshead, England, was abandoned after halftime when a hearse and another vehicle drove in circles on the pitch. Police are investigating the incident, local media reports.

title: Indian rescuers recover 27 dead but no sign of dozens of missing villagers swamped by a landslide
description: Hundreds of rescuers in western India have recovered 27 dead as they pushed on with a fourth day of searching for scores of people still missing after heavy monsoon rains triggered a massive landslide

title: Seasonal floods hit eastern China and leave at least 5 dead and over 1,500 evacuated
description: China's state media says five people have died and three others are missing after floods caused by heavy rain hit the eastern part of the country

title: Deck collapse at Montana country club leaves multiple people injured, police say
description: A deck has collapsed at a Montana country club, leaving up to 25 people injured

title: Judge orders Montana health clinic to pay nearly $6 million over false asbestos claims
description: The Montana clinic submitted hundreds of false asbestos claims.

title: WATCH:  National zoo celebrates panda's 25th birthday
description: Mei Xiang, a giant panda living at Washington D.C.’s National Zoo, celebrated her 25th birthday with a cake and other treats.
